say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say Hello to someone

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello("Krishna")

'Hello Krishna!'
{% endraw %}

Helper functions

{% raw %}

computeDayHours[source]

computeDayHours(col1, col2)

Compute the time in hours between the given columns. Used for computing the time in hours between two timestamps.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

computeDayHoursRest[source]

computeDayHoursRest(col1, col2)

Used to compute the time from first time stamp and in the day given by the second. Example: time duration between 5.45 upto midnight. We pass the 5.45 and the day in the col2. timestamp of just day gives us time at 00 hrs, which is the day start. So we compute 24 - [col1_time - day_start]

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

loadData[source]

loadData(spark, dataPath, bootstrap=True)

loads the data into the DF

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

generatePerDayStats[source]

generatePerDayStats(dataFrame)

This functions takes an interval based dataframe and computes per day statistics

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

generateUMStats[source]

generateUMStats(dataFrame)

This functions takes an interval based dataframe and computes UM statistics

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

writeData[source]

writeData(dataFrame, filename)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

getSpark[source]

getSpark()

Create a spark context
